casebody.data:
CITIBANK, N.A.
v.
Henry M. MICHAUX, Jr. aka Henry M. Michaux aka H.M. Michaux, Jr. aka H.M. Michaux aka H.M. Mickey Michaux, Jr. aka H.M. Mickey Michaux aka Henry McKinley Michaux, Jr. aka Henry McKinley Michaux. No. 161P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Eric C. Michaux, Durham, for Michaux, H.M. Mickey (aka). Harrison A. Lord, Charlotte, for Citibank, N.A.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th of May 2015 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
